actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Rules of the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rules of the House

official_title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for debate on major policy issues.

summary.text: Amends rule XIV of the Rules of the House of Representatives to recognize a Member to make a one minute speech during debate on a major policy issue if it is indicated to the Speaker or the Chairman of the Committee of the Whole that it is relevant to such legislation. Limits such recognition to a maximum of ten times during any session of the Congress.

titles.title: To amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for debate on major policy issues.
